description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Notices, historical and antiquarian, of the Castle and Priory at Castleacre, in the County of Norfolk ... With twenty-three illustrations ... from original drawings, by Mr. Charles Wright" Author: BLOOM, John Hague. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 797.i.15." Page: 287 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1843 Publisher: Pelham Richardson Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000379833 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
